Text:
ok now, leinil yu and walt simonson have done extremely good work. i was a fan of both before this title...

matteo scalera? big shoes to fill...

thanks mirrormaster82!
You're welcome STF.Didn't read this series after issue 4 so I'm kinda in the dark...

well, it's pretty simple. bruce works for shield. shield uses hulk as a riot weapon. bruce enjoys pissing off maria hill. this issue is very good. scalera's art isn't great but it's pretty good.

fun series! highly recommend it.
